TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务和客户端提供所有读取器和编写器的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all readers and writers for Web services and clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务编写器和读取器分别在参数或返回 Web 方法的对象和 HTTP 请求或响应流之间进行序列化和反序列化。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameter or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. 类在客户端和服务端为读取器和编写器类建立通用接口和功能。The class establishes a common interface and functionality for reader and writer classes, in both client and service-side . 类支持通过 HTTP GET 和 http POST 操作来实现 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 实现。The class supports the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. 在 HTTP 中, GET 操作请求参数以 HTTP 请求的统一资源定位器 (URL) 进行编码。In HTTP-GET operations request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request's Uniform Resource Locator (URL). 在 HTTP POST 操作中, 请求参数在 HTTP 请求正文中使用 HTML 格式进行编码。In HTTP-POST operations, request parameters are encoded in the HTTP request body, as with an HTML form. 对于这两种实现, 返回值将作为非 SOAP XML 文档出现在 HTTP 响应正文中。With both implementations, the return value appears in the HTTP response body as a non-SOAP XML document. 开发人员通常不需要直接使用或其子类。A developer typically does not need to directly use or its descendant classes. 相反, 当 wsdl.exe 工具根据 HTTP GET 或 http POST 实现生成客户端代理代码时, 它会将应用于每个 Web 方法, 并将属性的和属性设置为适当的类型。派生自类。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's and properties to the appropriate type derived from the class. 在服务器上, 将根据 ASP.NET 配置文件 (web.config) 中的设置使用适当的派生类型。On the server, the appropriate derived types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config). 在客户端上, 根据 WSDL 确定适当的派生类型。On the client the appropriate derived types are determined from the WSDL.

param.span: 用于初始化早期通过派生类的 方法的实现获取的实例的对象。

span.span: An object used to initialize the instance obtained earlier through the derived class's implementation of the method.

summary.span: 创建和初始化从 派生的具体类的实例。

span.span: Creates and initializes an instance of a concrete class derived from .
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建派生类的实例并调用该抽象方法的派生类的实现。 The method creates an instance of the derived class and invokes the derived class's implementation of the abstract method. 在处理请求或响应时调用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed. 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 将初始值设定项作为参数传递给方法是从派生类的另一个实例获取的, 方法是在客户端或服务初始化过程中调用方法。The initializer passed as a parameter to the method is obtained from another instance of the derived class, by invoking the method during client or service initialization.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object

abstract member GetInitializer : System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo -> obj

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 包含指定方法的初始值设定项的 。

span.span: An that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 实例方法的派生类实现在客户端或服务初始化过程中调用。A derived class's implementation of the instance method is invoked during client or service initialization. 稍后, 在处理请求或响应时, 初始值设定项对象将被传递给静态方法, 该方法将创建派生类的另一个对象的实例, 然后传递给方法以对其进行初始化。Later, at the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the static method, which creates an instance of another object of the derived class, and then to the method to initialize it. 其他对象执行实际的读取或写入。The other object performs the actual reading or writing.

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其中包含指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: A object that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 静态方法调用派生类的方法, 隐式创建派生类的实例。The static method invokes the derived class's method, implicitly creating an instance of the derived class. 在处理请求或响应时, 初始值设定项对象将传递给派生类的另一个实例的方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 后一对象执行实际的读取或写入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

abstract member GetInitializers : System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo[] -> obj[] override this.GetInitializers : System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo[] -> obj[]

param.name: methodInfos
param.span: 一个 Web 方法数组，对于每个方法，都将从该数组中获取一个对象，获取的对象与返回的初始值设定项数组中相应的索引对应。

span.span: An array of Web methods where, for each method, the object of the corresponding index in the returned initializer array is obtained.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

returns.span: 与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: An array of initializer objects corresponding to the input array of method definitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 实例方法为每个输入 Web 方法调用实例方法。 The instance method invokes the instance method for each input Web method. 这意味着已创建从派生的类的实例。This means an instance of a class derived from has already been created. 在处理请求或响应时, 初始值设定项将传递到派生类的另一个实例的方法。At the time a request or response is processed, the initializer is passed to the method of another instance of the derived class. 后一对象执行实际的读取或写入。The latter object performs the actual reading or writing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 静态方法导致调用属于由`type`参数指定的派生类的方法。The static method causes the invocation of the method belonging to the derived class specified by the `type` parameter.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，初始化一个实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes an instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在处理请求或响应时调用的; 但是, 在客户端或服务初始化过程中, 通过在另一个实例上调用方法获取初始值设定项。 The method is invoked at the time a request or response is processed; however, the initializer is obtained by calling the method on another instance during client or service initialization.
